name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.clip
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.clip() method of the Canvas 2D API turns the current or given path into the current clipping region. The previous clipping region, if any, is intersected with the current or given path to create the new clipping region.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.clip' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
